definition[0]: someone who buys and sells goods or stocks
example[0]: a small trader who sells hats in Oxford
example[1]: To the surprise of many Wall Street traders, the dollar rose yesterday.
definition[1]: someone who deals in shares, bonds, currencies, COMMODITIES (=oil, metal, farm products) etc on a market either for themselves or for a financial institution
example[2]: To the surprise of many traders, the dollar rose in European markets.
definition[2]: someone who buys and sells goods
